tue.yellow

Class Doctor

  • java.lang.Object
    • tue.yellow.Doctor

  • public class Doctor
extends java.lang.Object
    Doctor is the class for the doctors in the emergency room. A doctor has a name, an indicator of their availability, an assigned patient, and a current activity.

    A doctor interacts with patients, in order to give treatment.

    Author:
    Team Yellow

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Doctor(java.lang.String staffName, ListTracker listTracker)
      Creates a doctor object, using two input values:
      1) name of the doctor
      2) list type of the doctor (meaning the emergency room of the doctor)
      This method adds the doctor to the list of the emergency room upon creation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Doctor

        public Doctor(java.lang.String staffName,
              ListTracker listTracker)
        Creates a doctor object, using two input values:
        1) name of the doctor
        2) list type of the doctor (meaning the emergency room of the doctor)
        This method adds the doctor to the list of the emergency room upon creation.

        Furthermore, the staff availability is set to NOT_AVAILABLE and current activity is set to "unknown". Also, upon creation, a doctor object is not related to a patient yet, so the assigned patient is null.

        Parameters:
        staffName - name of the doctor
        listTracker - the emergency room this doctor belongs to

      • Doctor

        public Doctor(java.lang.String staffName)
        Creates a doctor object, using only as input the name of the doctor. This method doesn't add the doctor to the list of the emergency room upon creation.

        Furthermore, the staff availability is set to NOT_AVAILABLE and current activity is set to "unknown". Also, upon creation, a doctor object is not related to a patient yet, so the assigned patient is null.

        Parameters:
        staffName - name of the doctor

        Returns:
        the current activity of the doctor

      • setCurrentActivity

        public void setCurrentActivity(java.lang.String currentActivity)
        Sets the current activity of this doctor. When the doctor is currently at home, the staff availability will be set at NOT_AVAILABLE.
        Parameters:
        currentActivity - the current activity of the doctor

      • performClinicalExam

        public void performClinicalExam(Patient assignedPatient)
        Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.

        This method is called by the method performClinicalExam() of the nurse. Since both the nurse and doctor are required at this treatment step, when the nurse calls that method, the doctor (if available) is also allocated to this treatment, and associated to that patient.
        While performing Clinical Examination, the doctor and patient are assigned to each other, the current status of the patient is changed to IN_TREATMENT. The current activity of the doctor will be "Performing a Clinical Examination", while the doctor's availability will be NOT_AVAILABLE while performing this method.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient who will receive this Clinical Examination

      • performExternalMI

        public void performExternalMI(Patient assignedPatient)
        Performs an External Medical Imaging on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.

        This method is called by the method performExternalMI() of the nurse. Since both the nurse and doctor are required at this treatment step, when the nurse calls that method, the doctor (if available) is also allocated to this treatment, and associated to that patient.
        While performing External Medical Imaging, the doctor and patient are assigned to each other, the current status of the patient is changed to IN_TREATMENT. The current activity of the doctor will be "Performing an External Medical Imaging", while the doctor's availability will be NOT_AVAILABLE while performing this method.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient who will receive this External Medical Imaging

      • performMedication

        public void performMedication(Patient assignedPatient)
        Performs a Medication on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.

        This method is called by the method performMedication() of the nurse. Since both the nurse and doctor are required at this treatment step, when the nurse calls that method, the doctor (if available) is also allocated to this treatment, and associated to that patient.
        While performing Medication, the doctor and patient are assigned to each other, the current status of the patient is changed to IN_TREATMENT. The current activity of the doctor will be "Performing a Medication", while the doctor's availability will be NOT_AVAILABLE while performing this method.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient who will receive this Medication

      • performOtherExamTreatment

        public void performOtherExamTreatment(Patient assignedPatient)
        Performs an Other Examination and Treatment on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.

        This method is called by the method performOtherExamTreatment() of the nurse. Since both the nurse and doctor are required at this treatment step, when the nurse calls that method, the doctor (if available) is also allocated to this treatment, and associated to that patient.
        While performing Other Examination and Treatment, the doctor and patient are assigned to each other, the current status of the patient is changed to IN_TREATMENT. The current activity of the doctor will be "Performing an Other Examination and Treatment", while the doctor's availability will be NOT_AVAILABLE while performing this method.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient who will receive this Other Examination and Treatment

      • performDischarge

        public void performDischarge(Patient assignedPatient)
        Performs a Discharge on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.

        This method is called by the method performDischarge() of the nurse. Since both the nurse and doctor are required at this treatment step, when the nurse calls that method, the doctor (if available) is also allocated to this treatment, and associated to that patient.
        While performing Discharge, the doctor and patient are assigned to each other, the current status of the patient is changed to IN_TREATMENT. The current activity of the doctor will be "Performing a Discharge", while the doctor's availability will be NOT_AVAILABLE while performing this method.

        If the patient is still sick when discharge is performed, the patient will wait for boarding. If he/she is healthy, the patient will leave the emergency room immediately.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient who will receive this Discharge

      • finishTreatment

        public void finishTreatment(Patient assignedPatient,
                            Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
        Finishes treatment and gives a health status to this patient. Treatment can only be finished if the doctor is assigned to that patient, meaning that a treatment step has to be started and finished by the same doctor. The doctor gives an assessment of the health status after the treatment, and assigns this to the patient. The patient's status will be WAITING after treatment, and the staff member will become AVAILABLE again. After finishing treatment, the doctor will retreat to the staff room (current activity: "In the staff room").
        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient whose treatment will be finished
        healthStatus - the assessment from the doctor given to the patient following the treatment

      • releasePatient

        public void releasePatient(Patient assignedPatient)
        When a treatment is finished, the patient should not be assigned to the doctor anymore. Only the patient who has been currently assigned to the doctor can be released in this method.
        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient to be released from the doctor

      • goHome

        public void goHome()
        When a doctor goes home, he is not available anymore to perform treatment. This method sets his/her availability to NOT_AVAILABLE.

      • startWork

        public void startWork()
        When a doctor starts work, he is available to perform treatment. This method sets his/her availability to AVAILABLE.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Displays the information of a doctor object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Doctor information: name, availability, assigned patient, current activity
